name: Girl Time
description:
Nintendo.com Description (from Ad Blurbs)



From fashion tips and boy advice to mini games and a calendar, you’ll have all the essentials for your busy life.

Hey girl, everything you need is right in your DS. Get daily advice and tips for just about every life situation. Immerse yourself in daily horoscopes, quizzes, party planning tips and a friendship book! Pour your heart out in your own diary and keep it organized by Friends, Family, Dreams and more!

Features

• Daily Tips!• One Stop shop!• Your Secret Diary!
